[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [PerformanceStatistics](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.md)

## PerformanceStatistics class

Performance measurement central. Maintains the current \[\[FrameStats\]\], which holds all individual performance numbers.

Implemented as an instance for easy access.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PerformanceStatistics 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(enabled, maxNumFrames)](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics._constructor_.md) |  | Creates an instance of PerformanceStatistics. Overrides the current <code>instance</code>. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [appResults](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.appresults.md) |  | Map&lt;string, number&gt; | Additional results stored for the current application run, not per frame. Only the last value is stored. {<!-- -->(Map<!-- -->&lt;<!-- -->string, number<!-- -->&gt;<!-- -->)<!-- -->} |
|  [configs](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.configs.md) |  | Map&lt;string, string&gt; | Additional configuration values stored for the current application run, not per frame. Only the last value is stored. {<!-- -->(Map<!-- -->&lt;<!-- -->string, string<!-- -->&gt;<!-- -->)<!-- -->}  PerformanceStatistics |
|  [currentFrame](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.currentframe.md) |  | [FrameStats](./harp-mapview.framestats.md) | Current frame statistics. Contains all values for the current frame. Will be cleared when \[\[PerformanceStatistics\#storeFrameInfo\]\] is called. {<!-- -->FrameStats<!-- -->}  PerformanceStatistics |
|  [enabled](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.enabled.md) |  | boolean |  |
|  [frameEvents](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.frameevents.md) |  | [FrameStatsArray](./harp-mapview.framestatsarray.md) |  Only exported for testing.<!-- -->Return the array of frame events. |
|  [instance](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.instance.md) | <code>static</code> | [PerformanceStatistics](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.md) | Global instance to the instance. The current instance can be overridden by creating a new <code>PerformanceStatistics</code>. |
|  [isFull](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.isfull.md) |  | boolean | Returns <code>true</code> when the maximum number of storable frames is reached. {<!-- -->boolean<!-- -->}  PerformanceStatistics |
|  [maxNumFrames](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.maxnumframes.md) |  | number |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addMemoryInfo()](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.addmemoryinfo.md) |  | Add memory statistics to the current frame if available.  Currently only supported on Chrome |
|  [addWebGLInfo(webGlInfo)](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.addwebglinfo.md) |  | Add the render state information from \[\[THREE.WebGLInfo\]\] to the current frame. |
|  [clear()](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.clear.md) |  | Clears all settings, all stored frame events as well as the current frame values. PerformanceStatistics |
|  [clearFrames()](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.clearframes.md) |  | Clears only all stored frame events as well as the current frame values. PerformanceStatistics |
|  [getAsPlainObject(onlyLastFrame)](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.getasplainobject.md) |  | Convert to a plain object that can be serialized. Required to copy the test results over to nightwatch. |
|  [getAsSimpleFrameStatistics(onlyLastFrame)](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.getassimpleframestatistics.md) |  | Convert to a plain object that can be serialized. Required to copy the test results over to nightwatch. |
|  [getLastFrameStatistics()](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.getlastframestatistics.md) |  | Convert the last frame values to a plain object that can be serialized. Required to copy the test results over to nightwatch. |
|  [log(header, footer)](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.log.md) |  | Logs all values to the logger. |
|  [storeAndClearFrameInfo()](./harp-mapview.performancestatistics.storeandclearframeinfo.md) |  | Stores the current frame events into the array of events and clears all values. |
